jobs.title: Touched Sticker - Consul
jobs.content: Accessible landing page to people with any kind of visual impairment to promote Consul’s new tactile stickers, which allows the identification of the featrues for some Consul’s models of stoves and microwaves.

jobs.title: Mixer Limited Edition - KitchenAid
jobs.content: A special landing page for the limited edition of KitchenAid’s mixer, highlighting the product's details and being part of the official Kitchen Aid store.

jobs.title: Artisan Colors - KitchenAid Latin America
jobs.content: Communicate the launch of the new Astisan’s mixer in Brazil, providing an immersive experience for the costumer through multiple colors options.

jobs.title: Brastemp - Retro
jobs.content: The Brastemp Retro is a line of products that brings the 50s and 60s style to the present day. The landing page was created to show the product's details and to be part of the official Brastemp store.

jobs.title: Refrigerator Product Page - Consul
jobs.content: Showing the Consul's refrigerator, this page is responsive and has a intuitive and modern design. With details of the product, it is part of the official Consul store.

jobs.title: Páginas Coloridas - Coral/AkzoNobel
jobs.content: A platform that connects painters and customers, allowing the painter to create a profile and show their work, and the customer to find the painter closest to their location.
